gods.name: Jeokhwa
gods.title: Inferno's Heart
gods.lore: Primordial embodiment of celestial fire whose breath ignites eternal wildfires. Forged the first volcanoes by plunging his spear into the world's crust. His Eternal Pyre burns at Hwayang's core, consuming sacrifices and powering his divine wrath.

gods.name: Seolhyang
gods.title: Moon's Weeper
gods.lore: Weaver of cosmic threads who illuminates Wolhwa's eternal twilight. Her tears form moonstone lakes with healing properties. Maintains the Lunar Veil protecting mortals from void predators, though her grief over lost love fuels dangerous illusions.

gods.name: Cheolmun
gods.title: Forge's Song
gods.lore: Cosmic blacksmith whose hammer strikes shaped Cheolgeom's iron plains. His Song of Steel commands metal at molecular levels. Judges mortal smiths through ghostly visitations, rewarding purity of craft with divine blueprints.

gods.name: Mokhwa
gods.title: Life Dancer
gods.lore: Androgynous entity whose dance creates and destroys ecosystems. Their footsteps sprout ancient forests while sorrow births toxic fungi. Wanders as a druid, testing mortals with seeds that bloom into virtues or vices.

gods.name: Bingwu
gods.title: Frostbringer
gods.lore: Oracle of frozen truths who preserves history in glacial archives. His third eye sees temporal branches, but Voidfrost Wyrms devour his visions. Final prophecy warns of the Thaw that will drown or rebirth Cheonhae.

gods.name: Guryong
gods.title: Shadow's Jester
gods.lore: Cosmic parasite stitched from dead gods' remains. His Black Obelisk bleeds cursed ink that corrupts reality. Manipulates cults and kings through sentient shadows, seeking to reassemble his true form from divine fragments.

gods.name: Zephyros & Aeris
gods.title: Stormfather & Skymother
gods.lore: Divine couple whose love-hate relationship powers Bungu's floating islands. Zephyros' rage creates hurricanes while Aeris' Skyheart Gem prevents atmospheric collapse. Their missing son's return could either stabilize or destroy the skies.

gods.name: Nonghwa
gods.title: Harvest Matron
gods.lore: Earth mother whose heartbeat synchronizes with harvest cycles. Her Worldseed lies buried deep, capable of regrowing Cheonhae after apocalypse. Tests mortals through Terrahoof Boars that either bless farms or trample greed.

gods.name: Yongwang
gods.title: Scaled Sovereign
gods.lore: Dragon god enthroned on his son's bones. His shed scales birth Inferno Wyrms that ravage continents. Slumbers beneath the Ashen Spine, his roars triggering eruptions when Chaoswyrms challenge his supremacy.

gods.name: Haewang & Mirae
gods.title: Storm Tyrant & Tide Mother
gods.lore: Divine couple governing Haeguk's opposing seas. Haewang's trident churns killer whirlpools while Mirae's Pearl of Equilibrium calms waters. Their missing Tideprince's return could either unify oceans or drown continents.

gods.name: Yongma
gods.title: Shattered Star
gods.lore: Mad god-carcass warping Pyeonji's reality. His death scream birthed floating islands and gravity storms. Cultists seek his Antimatter Heart to 'cleanse' Cheonhae through total annihilation, unaware it would unmake existence itself.
